interactions: m_c is developing a crush on r_c.
m_c might be reading a little too far into r_c's kindness.
m_c never realized how much they love spending time with r_c.
m_c is admiring r_c from afar...
m_c stayed up all night thinking of ways to impress r_c.
m_c thinks that r_c is really funny.
m_c is prancing around in front of r_c.
m_c just noticed how beautiful r_c's eyes are.
m_c thinks that r_c is really charming.
m_c laughs at bad jokes from r_c.
m_c made r_c laugh again and again.
m_c goes for a nice long walk with r_c.
m_c ensnares r_c with a charming smile.
m_c is hoping that r_c notices them.
m_c wonders what r_c thinks about mates.
m_c imagines what their family with r_c would look like.
m_c would spend the entire day with r_c if they could.
m_c keeps shyly glancing over at r_c as the Clan talks about mates
m_c doesn't want r_c to overwork themselves.
m_c catches themself staring at r_c a bit too often.
m_c gets flustered when r_c compliments their skill.
m_c feels their jaw drop when the sun catches just right on r_c's pelt.
m_c immediately thinks of r_c when the topic of mates is brought up.
m_c is nervous sitting next to r_c at the Clan meeting.
m_c brushes against r_c while correcting their stance and looks away with a purr.
m_c left a gift in r_c's nest for them to find.
m_c picked out the best piece of prey to share with r_c.
m_c sees r_c stumble while hunting and thinks it's cute.
m_c wants to confess their love to r_c.
m_c is wondering what it would be like to grow old with r_c.
m_c is the first cat that r_c thinks of when they get good news.
m_c realizes their heart always flutters whenever they see r_c.
m_c feels like no one understands them the way r_c does.
m_c would give it all to make r_c's dreams come true.
m_c thinks r_c is the most beautiful cat in the Clan.
m_c can't stop thinking about r_c.
m_c feels giddy about getting on the same patrol as r_c.
m_c wants r_c to understand how crazy they are about them.
m_c thinks r_c has a lovely sense of humor.
m_c is spending a lot of time with r_c.
m_c enjoys the time with r_c and feels secure.
m_c wants to spend the entire day with r_c.
m_c saves a piece of prey for r_c because they know it's their favorite.
m_c brings r_c some fresh-kill, hoping that they remembered what r_c's favorite was.
m_c got stuck in the same tree with r_c for hours and realized how much they have in common.
m_c asks r_c to help them freshen up on some battle moves, and compliments them constantly during it.
m_c asks r_c to go fishing with them, but they keep on getting distracted by each other.
m_c gives r_c a beautiful feather they found, and hides behind their whiskers when thanked.
m_c gives r_c a wonderfully colored pebble they found, and hides behind their whiskers when thanked.
m_c gives r_c a circular Twoleg object they found, and hides behind their whiskers when thanked.
m_c compliments r_c on how well groomed their pelt is today.
m_c compliments r_c on how sharp their claws are today.
m_c compliments r_c on their catch during a hunting patrol, which causes them to purr.
m_c gave a pretty flower they found to r_c.
m_c picks some fragrant flowers for r_c.
m_c decorates r_c's nest with flowers to surprise them!
m_c rolls around in (herb) after hearing r_c likes their smell.
m_c is rolling around a little too playfully with r_c...
m_c could spend hours listening to r_c's voice.
m_c hopes to dream of r_c tonight.
m_c is the only cat who can make r_c laugh.
m_c was caught enjoying a moonlit stroll with r_c last night...
m_c sneaks out at night to sleep in r_c's nest.
m_c purrs a long time at one of r_c's lame jokes.
m_c gave a gift to r_c, but they turned up their nose at the offering.
m_c heard r_c express an ideal they cannot agree with.
m_c heard r_c talking badly about them.
m_c catches r_c staring at another cat.
m_c feels like r_c hasn't been paying much attention to them lately.
m_c is upset that r_c tried to give them their least favorite prey - surely they know what they like!
m_c wishes r_c would stop giving them gifts, as their nest is getting too full.
m_c hates the gift r_c gave them.
m_c told r_c to stop padding after them like a lost kit.
m_c worries that r_c isn't being honest with their relationship.
m_c can't stand r_c's snoring in their nest.
m_c starting to have doubts about their feelings for r_c.
m_c heard a rumor that r_c likes someone else.
m_c worries that r_c will never feel the same way they do.
m_c noticed r_c flirting with someone else.
m_c had a disagreement with r_c over kits.
m_c heard r_c discussing potential mates but their name never came up.
m_c feels ignored by r_c.
m_c didn't get the joke r_c was telling.
m_c thinks their dreams might not come true with r_c.
